Title: Killing Poe
Writer: Paul Engstrom, Steve Engstrom, Chris Firestone, Kevin Jacobs, Nathan Andrew Jacobs
Actors: Matt Bush, Osric Chau, Julianna Guill, Cyrina Fiallo
Plot: Killing Poe is a dark comedy about five students in a class on Edgar Allan Poe who teach their professor a lesson in true Poe style.
